title: Gillian Keegan – 2021 Comments on Seni’s Law
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Gillian Keegan, the Minister for Mental Health, on 7 December 2021.
content:
It is vital anyone receiving care in a mental health setting – a time which can be incredibly distressing – is treated with dignity and respect.
